Thanks for Upload. 

I have one request for you bro, I want you to reseed one of your old torrent "In Cold Blood". Can you please reseed it, here's the link : http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4516275/(PSX-PSP)_In_Cold_Blood_converted_properly_(Kingdom-games_by_Klo

If u want to play it on psx or ps2... just download the iso and burn it on a cd... this can't be played on them because this is an Eboot file, made to use only on psp. There is a way to extract the iso from this file, but easier to find it in iso...
